publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3754.1 Tommy Sheridan: Report on Inquiry into the Rail Industry in Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3754) in the name of Bristow Muldoon, insert at end "but, however, believes that the problems of the rail industry can only be solved by one company running an integrated national network and therefore calls for ScotRail, Network Rail and all other private rail companies to be brought fully into democratic public ownership."
